Text: Thank You so much NishLakhani! You are on the ball with this quick upload. I do hope that Jason's fans, like myself, pay for the new album. He deserves the album sales. However, no one should ever have to pay for Live recordings! That's why they sell tickets.

For those fans who don't already know, you can download [almost] every Jason Mraz concert for free at: http://www.archive.org/details/JasonMraz . You can download individual songs or complete shows. You don't have to sign-up, give an email address, or any of that crap either. Enjoy!
Hey NishLakhani, is Live or Love??? I was looking for Love and i didn't find your torrent. Thanks for the torrent anyway. +1.
